branchCategory.name: SS0750 Plug-in Stacking Manifold, Decentralized Serial EX500, S Kit
branchCategory.description: <p>S0700 Plug-in manifold with EX500 gateway type serial system.  EX500 system allows connection of up to 8 manifolds along with input units.  Available protocol include EtherNet/IP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">™</span>, PROFINET<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®</span>, DeviceNet<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">™</span> and PROFIBUS-DP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®</span>.</p>
